Package Card

The Card classes represent actions that a Player must take when they draw a Card after landing on the Community Card space or the Chance Card space on the game board.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    This is the abstract base class for all the other card classes.
    CashTransferToPlayersCard
    This class is for cards that transfer money to or from all the players in the game.
    GetOutOfJailFreeCard
    This is a special card that the player who draws it gets to keep, and use to get out of jail for free.
    MoveToLocationCard
    This class is for cards that force the player to move to a specific location.
    MoveToSpaceCard
    This class is for the card that tells the player to move back 3 spaces, it could be used for other kinds of movements based on number of spaces.
    RealEstateRepairCard
    This class is for the cards that require the player who receives it to pay a variable amount based on the number of houses and hotels that player owns.
    StaticCashTransferCard
    This class is for cards that transfer sums of money that are known at the start of the game.

Package Card Description

The Card classes represent actions that a Player must take when they draw a Card after landing on the Community Card space or the Chance Card space on the game board.
